archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.2.3c: c) technology used by individuals (e.g. targeted malware attacks, service degradation, or corruption of information in end user developed applications, such as spreadsheets)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
